cpuUsageSeconds.label: CPU Usage Seconds
cpuUsageSeconds.tooltip: Total time the service has used the CPUs

totalRequests.label: Total Requests
totalRequests.tooltip: Total amount of requests your services have received excluding functions

functionInvocations.label: Function Invocations

metrics.helperText: Your resource usage since the beginning of the month.
